author: Eliza Mackintosh and Ivana Kottasová, CNN
title: What you need to know about coronavirus on Wednesday, April 8
description: As nations look to their leaders for guidance in this time of crisis, British Prime Minister Boris Johnson is waging his own personal fight against the virus from an intensive care bed. Here's what else you need to know for Tuesday.
content:
A version of this story appeared in the April 8 edition of CNN's Coronavirus: Fact vs. Fiction newsletter. Sign up here to receive the need-to-know headlines every weekday.
